TopicTitle: [Mod Question: Please Reply] How to define attachment node locations.

Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone, and I am making a part for an upcoming mod, but I am confused on the node placement part of the CFG. How do I determine the correct node placement?

Thanks, Bottle Rocketeer 500
Please read the pinned thread that have the info you need before posting a "Please Reply thread".

Sarbian is correct.  Which is a phrase we should probably admit more around here.  The tutorials will help you.  Easiest way is to put an empty game object inside the model hierarchy in unity and drag it to the right place... then read off the local position in the inspector panel.   Or even better...  leave the empty node there, orient it correctly and use IT for the placement.    The tutorials will get you there!  I promise!  Keep working at it!
